alert.note: Alert for Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 25 at 8:05PM MDT until July 25 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JERAULD COUNTY... At 904 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles northwest of Wessington Springs, or 29 miles southeast of Miller, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Wessington Springs. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
